metadata.Title: CVE-2017-16921 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In OTRS 6.0.x up to and including 6.0.1, OTRS 5.0.x up to and including 5.0.24, and OTRS 4.0.x up to and including 4.0.26, an attacker who is logged into OTRS as an agent can manipulate form parameters (related to PGP) and execute arbitrary shell commands with the permissions of the OTRS or web server user.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-16921` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

otrs - 6.0.5-1
otrs2 - 6.0.5-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: otrs2 package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.0.5-1').
